H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2134.def: = state in which a substance has not been mixed or adulterated with any other substance

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H3795.def: = process by which {L:olives<SDBH:זַיִת>} are {L:pressed<SDBH:כתת>} in a mortar in order to extract the {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}

H2132.def: = tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈  regarded as beautiful and associated with well-being

H3974.def: = object that produces or reflects light

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H6532.def: = a relatively large piece of cloth, woven by a craftsman with costly materials, ► separating the Holy Place from the Most Holy Place in the sanctuary, and covering the Ark of the Covenant when it was being moved

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H2708.def: = patterns of behavior that a community expects its members to follow

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4501.def: = stand ► designed to hold one or more lamps so that the lamps can light a large area

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5560.def: = finely ground flour ◄ from only the inner kernel of the wheat, resulting in a high quality flour

H644.def: = causative action by which humans prepare food with dry heat without direct exposure to a flame, typically in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H2471.def: = type of {L:bread<SDBH:לֶחֶם>}, shaped like a ring, ◄ made out of {L:fine flour<SDBH:סֹלֶת>} and other ingredients by {L:baking<SDBH:אפה>} it in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}; ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (usually unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites; ≈ regarded as high quality bread

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H4635.def: = state in which objects are arranged in a certain order

H234.def: = relatively small part of a larger quantity of substance offered in sacrifice which is burnt on the altar as a token representing the entire quantity

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H8019.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Dibri<SDBH:דִּבְרִי>}, tribe of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}; ► married an {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} man and had a son who was later stoned for blaspheming

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1704.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}; ► father of {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}, the mother of a man who was stoned to death for blasphemy

H1835.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
